other_tests.findings: Undetectable serum levels of GH at baseline (<0.05 ng/ml) and blunted GH responses to insulin and arginine stimulation tests.
other_tests.changes_over_time: GH therapy administered from 4.8 to 18 years of age; specific changes in GH levels over time not mentioned.

other_tests.findings: No responses of ACTH and cortisol.
Normal responses of LH and FSH.
TSH and PRL measurements showed no specific findings mentioned.
Novel homozygous mutation identified in exon 4 (S179R).
